Post:
Conversational editing is rolling out to all eligible Android users in the U.S.! 

Just ask Google Photos to make edits with text or voice. Make a quick fix or explore your creativity. Try:

 "Restore this photo"
 "Fix the glare"
 "Change the background to a beach”

Comments.comment: Learn more:

I have a issue also. I have private photos and bank accounts and my mambrake@gmail was hacked. I don't even understand how they changed my recovery phone and bypassed my two step verification. I have contacted banks and Stocks. i need this fixed please
Love it
iOS users:
beach backgrounds about to become the new profile pic meta

Fantastic UX. The real marvel is the underlying AI pipeline: an LLM for intent recognition ("Fix the glare") that triggers a cascade of CV models for segmentation, etc.

It's a true multi-modal agent, and it's the future of all creative tools.

#AI #ComputerVision #NLP

Post: Today, we’re introducing Gemini for Google TV, so you can talk more naturally to the big screen to find the perfect movie, brainstorm a family trip or get help with studying. Just say “Hey Google” or press the microphone button on your TV remote.

Comments.comment: Learn more about Gemini for Google TV ↓

Gemini Toolbox is a must have, 
I love google gemini but I think it lacked some key features, Thank God I found this cool tool, gemini toolbox is a must have.

Hello, please help me unblock my Google account bezproblemuzaplbezproblemuzapl@gmail.com. It's been hacked. I can't do anything. The recovery email and phone number have also been changed by the hacker.
Hi there. Let's see if we can help. Please follow us and let us know when you have so we can share next steps through DM.

Good morning,
I would like urgent support with my account. Could you help me or inform me how and where to resolve this?
Hi Rick. Without revealing your email address, tell us more about what's going on with your account. We'll see what we can do to help.
